author: Reuters Editorial
title: Mexican coronavirus cases pass 1,000, health ministry says
description: Mexico's health ministry on Monday confirmed 1,094 cases of coronavirus in the country, up from 993 the day before.
content:
MEXICO CITY (Reuters) - Mexico’s health ministry on Monday confirmed 1,094 cases of coronavirus in the country, up from 993 the day before. 
It also said 28 people had died from the virus in Mexico, up from 20 a day earlier. 
Reporting by Stefanie Eschenbac… [+32 chars]
